title: EDATEC’s industrial PC builds on Raspberry Pi 5
description: The ED-IPC3020 is an industrial computer engineered around the latest Raspberry Pi 5, featuring the Broadcom BCM2712, a 2.4GHz quad-core 64-bit Arm Cortex-A76 CPU. This device is equipped with various I/O serial ports and includes PoE support. The system offers two memory configurations: 4GB and 8GB of LPDDR4X-4267 SDRAM, targeting diverse performance requirements. In terms […]
